00001 #include "LineSegment.h"
00002 #include "BoundingBox.h"
00003 
00004 namespace jvgs
00005 {
00006     namespace math
00007     {
00008         LineSegment::LineSegment(const Vector2D &start, const Vector2D &end)
00009         {
00010             this->start = start;
00011             this->end = end;
00012             boundingBox = 0;
00013         }
00014 
00015         LineSegment::~LineSegment()
00016         {
00017             if(boundingBox)
00018                 delete boundingBox;
00019         }
00020 
00021         const Vector2D &LineSegment::getStart() const
00022         {
00023             return start;
00024         }
00025 
00026         const Vector2D &LineSegment::getEnd() const
00027         {
00028             return end;
00029         }
00030 
00031         Line LineSegment::getLine() const
00032         {
00033             return Line(start, end - start);
00034         }
00035 
00036         float LineSegment::getLength() const
00037         {
00038             return start.getDistance(end);
00039         }
00040 
00041         Vector2D LineSegment::getPoint(float t) const
00042         {
00043             return start * (1.0f - t) + end * t;
00044         }
00045 
00046         BoundingBox *LineSegment::getBoundingBox()
00047         {
00048             if(!boundingBox) {
00049                 /* Calculate the segment bounding box x. */
00050                 float minX, maxX, minY, maxY;
00051                 if(start.getX() < end.getX()) {
00052                     minX = start.getX();
00053                     maxX = end.getX();
00054                 } else {
00055                     minX = end.getX();
00056                     maxX = start.getX();
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 /* Calculate the segment bounding box x. */
00060                 if(start.getY() < end.getY()) {
00061                     minY = start.getY();
00062                     maxY = end.getY();
00063                 } else {
00064                     minY = end.getY();
00065                     maxY = start.getY();
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 boundingBox = new BoundingBox(Vector2D(minX, minY),
00069                         Vector2D(maxX, maxY));
00070             }
00071 
00072             return boundingBox;
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
